title: The Supply Chain, Batteries, And Market Outlook
itunes:title: The Supply Chain, Batteries, And Market Outlook
description:
Brent Schutte, Chief Investment Strategist at Northwestern Mutual Wealth Management Company, discusses inflation, Fed tapering, and his market outlook for 2022. Anabel Fernandez, Interim CFO and Treasurer of Dream Finders Homes, talks about selling homes in high-growth markets and why she’s bullish on real estate heading into 2022. Tom Jensen, CEO and co-founder of FREYR Battery, talks about how battery technology affects the future of renewable energy. Primit Parikh, President, COO, and co-founder of Transphorm, talks about battery production, semiconductors, and other energy-related issues. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
